sourcesContent:
Welcome to our web-based file sharing program, designed to allow multiple users to share files on a local network. Users can join
rooms and share files with others in those rooms. Our program offers a convenient and efficient way for users to share files with each other,
without the need for external cloud storage or file transfer services.
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-description-box', templateUrl: './description-box.component.html', styleUrls: ['./description-box.component.css'] }) export class DescriptionBoxComponent { showDescription = false; toggle() { this.showDescription = !this.showDescription; } }
